Sorry for being a noob, but how to I "run" hacked maps? I placed the STARCRACK folder and SC2_MEDIUM_AI folder in the Starcraft II Beta folder. Do I need to paste any of the other files anywhere, like the maps?

You run the maps using lazylaunch. You must have a patched version of the sc2 beta to use this.

The only file you need to worry about is the "Base.SC2Data" file that goes in the "StarCraft II Beta\Mods\Liberty.SC2Mod" folder which is pretty much done for you in the starcrack folder.

This is the only explanation im giving on this subject as I know alot of people are just to lazy to attempt things themselves.
